resources.string: Quick Posts
Main Menu: Share a URL or Photo to your timeline, Edit a timeline post, or Delete a timeline post on your Facebook account
Login to your Facebook, or continue with your account logged in directly to the Facebook app. Note: some of the features will be inaccessible if you do not have the native Facebook app downloaded.
